definition: of or relating to or determined by geodesy, (mathematics) the shortest line between two points on a mathematically defined surface (as a straight line on a plane or an arc of a great circle on a sphere)
details:
adjective
- of or relating to or determined by geodesy
= synonyms: geodetic
noun
- (mathematics) the shortest line between two points on a mathematically defined surface (as a straight line on a plane or an arc of a great circle on a sphere)
= synonyms: geodesic line
